name: Project Boost (MaximusBlake)
description:
Space- to Boost

A and D - to Rotate Rocket

Can you get past Level 4? 

Project Boost

I learned how to create multiple levels and switch between them.

This game is about a rocket attempting to boost its way through a set of five diverse levels. 

I followed the videos on Udemy and added my own flare. I learned a lot about Prefabs and Game Objects in Unity and how Scripts affect them.

I added a different camera then they had. I created some background set pieces. My levels were more individual then theirs were.
